name: Freedom Tour Era Styles
description: Rock era configurations for the Plague Tour Stop cards. Each plague gets its own rock sub-genre aesthetic.

heavy-metal.name: Heavy Metal
heavy-metal.inspiration: Iron Maiden, Judas Priest, Black Sabbath album art

typography.style: aggressive angular metal font with sharp serifs
typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters styled as metal band logo - angular, imposing

borderTreatment.style: studded leather border with chrome spikes
borderTreatment.corners: pentagram-inspired geometric shapes (using Star of David instead)
borderTreatment.edge: riveted metal plates with blood drips

heavy-metal.finishEffect: chrome reflection with wet blood sheen
heavy-metal.visualLanguage: Aggressive, dripping logos, Nile River turning to blood as a metal album cover

punk.name: Punk Rock
punk.inspiration: Sex Pistols, Ramones, DIY zine aesthetic, xerox art

typography.style: ransom note cut-out letters, uneven sizing
typography.treatment: hand-drawn, spray-painted, or cut from newspaper
typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters as chaotic cut-outs, deliberately messy

borderTreatment.style: torn paper edges, safety pins holding it together
borderTreatment.corners: anarchist-A symbols replaced with Hebrew letters

punk.visualLanguage: Chaotic, DIY, frogs as punk rebellion against the establishment

grunge.name: Grunge
grunge.inspiration: Nirvana, Pearl Jam, Soundgarden, Seattle scene

typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters looking scratched or carved, imperfect

grunge.visualLanguage: Uncomfortable, itchy, the plague you can't escape from

hair-metal.name: Hair Metal / Glam
hair-metal.inspiration: Motley Crue, Poison, Def Leppard, big hair excess

typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters with big hair, glam styling

borderTreatment.style: leopard print or animal print border

hair-metal.finishEffect: glossy with neon glow, hairspray shine
hair-metal.visualLanguage: Excess, wild party, beasts as the ultimate 80s chaos

death-metal.name: Death Metal
death-metal.inspiration: Cannibal Corpse, Morbid Angel, Death - extreme imagery

typography.style: illegible death metal logo style, thorny and twisted
typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters as thorny, twisted death metal typography

death-metal.finishEffect: matte with sickly sheen, like diseased skin

industrial.name: Industrial
industrial.inspiration: Nine Inch Nails, Ministry, Rammstein - mechanical, clinical

typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters as industrial stencils or warning text

industrial.finishEffect: brushed metal with rust spots and oxidation
industrial.visualLanguage: Mechanical suffering, boils as industrial malfunction of the body

power-metal.name: Power Metal
power-metal.inspiration: Helloween, Blind Guardian, DragonForce - epic fantasy

colors.gradient: ice blue to fire orange - fire and ice

typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters as ancient runes, epic and heroic

power-metal.finishEffect: holographic shimmer, ice crystals with fire glow within
power-metal.visualLanguage: Epic fantasy, fire within ice, supernatural spectacle

thrash-metal.name: Thrash Metal
thrash-metal.inspiration: Metallica, Slayer, Megadeth, Anthrax - speed and aggression

typography.style: speed lines, aggressive angles, motion blur
typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters with speed lines, aggressive motion

thrash-metal.finishEffect: matte with aggressive texture, like locust wings

goth.name: Gothic Rock
goth.inspiration: The Cure, Bauhaus, Siouxsie and the Banshees - ethereal darkness

typography.treatment: silver on black, moonlit, barely visible
typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters in elegant gothic script, silver on darkness

goth.finishEffect: deep matte black with subtle silver shimmer, like starlight
goth.visualLanguage: Ethereal, poetic darkness, the tangible black that can be felt

arena-rock.name: Arena Rock / Classic Rock
arena-rock.inspiration: Queen, Journey, Foreigner - emotional, lighters in the air

colors.gradient: golden sunrise, dawn after the long night

typography.hebrew: Hebrew letters as grand, emotionally weighted typography

arena-rock.finishEffect: gold foil with warm glow, stadium light effect
arena-rock.visualLanguage: Emotional climax, the final show, devastating and cathartic
